item.description:
Join 500 guests for Boston's biggest fall singles event and fundraiser! Bid on a date with smoldering fire fighters, traffic stopping police officers & Boston area's most eligible single guys and ladies in a live auction hosted by NECN anchors Steve Aveson & Bridget Blythe.

Ladies- the top ten bachelors will come with $150 Sofft Shoes gift certificate just for you! Guys- don't miss out- this is a great way to meet lots of lovely ladies!

Each 'couple' receives a gift cert. to a Boston restaurant, comedy club, harbor cruise, etc. to use on their date. The event also features a silent auction with autographed sports memorabilia, sky diving experience and more!

All of the proceeds benefit Project Smile, the non profit organization dedicated to helping children who are victims of traumatic events. This event is our biggest fundraiser.

Tickets are only $17 and include a gift bag. Advanced tickets are highly recommended. Please get your tickets at: www.projectsmile.org/events.htm

Â
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside the event area. I am hosting the event!
item.name: 6th Annual Project Smile Charity Date Auction: Biggest Fall Singles Event
